message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm aiming to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value you've placed on it and my own needs. I'm open to discussing this further.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,250,000 is significantly below my minimum.  I could consider coming down to $1,350,000.  This offer reflects some flexibility on my end while still recognizing the inherent value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,350,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm prepared to offer $1,300,000.  This is a fair price considering the value we both place on this product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
